```java
<entity class="entity.Person" name="Person">     <table name="Person"/>
     <attributes>
         <id name="id"/>
         <basic name="name">
             <column name="NAME" length="100"/>
         </basic>
         <basic name="age"/>
     </attributes>
</entity>
```

```java
<entity class="com.example.Tutorial">    <table name="tutorial"/>
    <attributes>
        <id name="id">
            <generated-value strategy="IDENTITY"/>
            <column name="tutorial_id"/>
        </id>
        <basic name="title">
            <column name="title"/>
        </basic>
    </attributes>
</entity>
```
